attributes.action: Make it law to report if you hit a cat in a traffic accident
attributes.additional_details:
If you hit a dog it must be reported to the police, however this isn't the case for cats. However cats are as loved a pets as dogs so why should this be. 

260,000 cats are killed every year in road traffic accidents however this isn't reported.
attributes.background: There are many cats killed in road traffic accidents however you do not need to report it if you hit a cat, however if you hit a dog or other animals this should be reported. I feel cats owners deserve the same right to know if their cat has been killed.
